Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class contains the properties of a player.
    Version:
    12-6-2018
    Author:
    @author Matthijs Dirksen
